me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.Entity

Class CaDGameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.Entity.CaDGameHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    public class CaDGameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    This class acts as a container for a Cards Against Discord game session.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean active
      A boolean representing if the game is currently in progress.
      private int cardCount
      An integer representing how many cards each player should consistently have.
      private Player cardCzar
      The Player who is the current Card Czar.
      private Player owner
      The Player who owns the game.
      private java.util.List<Player> players
      A List of Players registered to this game.
      private java.util.List<BlackCard> previousBlackCards
      A List containing all previously-used BlackCards.
      private int winningScore
      An integer representing the score required by any player to win the game.

    • Field Detail

      • players

        private java.util.List<Player> players
        A List of Players registered to this game.

      • winningScore

        private int winningScore
        An integer representing the score required by any player to win the game.

      • cardCount

        private int cardCount
        An integer representing how many cards each player should consistently have.

      • previousBlackCards

        private java.util.List<BlackCard> previousBlackCards
        A List containing all previously-used BlackCards. This List serves to prevent the rare chance of a game using duplicate black cards.

      • owner

        private Player owner
        The Player who owns the game.

      • active

        private boolean active
        A boolean representing if the game is currently in progress.

        The Player who is the current Card Czar.
